text: Petar Fajfrić (; 15 February 1942 – 11 March 2021) was a Serbian handball coach and player who competed for Yugoslavia in the 1972 Summer Olympics, winning the gold medal. He also participated in two World Championships (1970 and 1974), bringing home a bronze medal. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Serbia Category:Handball coaches Category:Handball players
title: Petar Fajfrić
